```{r}
# Load required libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)

# Remove rows with missing values
penguins_clean <- penguins %>% 
  drop_na(bill_length_mm, bill_depth_mm, species)

# Create scatter plot of bill length vs bill depth, colored by species
ggplot(penguins_clean, aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, 
                           color = species, shape = species)) +
  geom_point(size = 3, alpha = 0.8) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
  labs(
    title = "Penguin Bill Dimensions by Species",
    subtitle = "Bill Length vs. Bill Depth (in mm)",
    x = "Bill Length (mm)",
    y = "Bill Depth (mm)",
    caption = "Data: palmerpenguins"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
    legend.position = "right",
    panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "gray90")
  )
```
